name: Minecraft
description: A Minecraft Paper Server on Heroku!

MINECRAFT_EULA.description: Do you accept the Minecraft EULA?

MINECRAFT_VERSION.description: Minecraft Paperclip Version | Available Versions can be found here https://papermc.io/downloads and here https://papermc.io/legacy

DROPBOX_API_TOKEN.description: Your personal dropbox API token ( Go to https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps , Click on create app, Select Dropbox API, Select App folder, Name the app & create it, Click on the app, Go to Generated access token, Click on Generate and Copy the key )

DNSEXIT_DNS.description: Your personal DnsExit DNS hostname ( Not required )

DNSEXIT_PASS.description: Your DnsExit User password ( Not required )
